data.text:
Schonborn, Germany: tourism, information and visitor reviews

Schonborn is situated in Germany, in the Rheinland-Pfalz region where it is within Rhein-Hunsruck-Kreis. It is also an administrative centre for the local region.

Geographical information

Place name: Schonborn

Sub-region: Rhein-Hunsruck-Kreis

Main Region: Rheinland-Pfalz

Country: Germany

Latitude: 49.95 North (49°57'0"N)

Longitude: 7.46667 East (7°28'0"E)

Altitude: 374 metres above sea-level

Population: 262 (most recent estimate only)
